name: Sky Conqueror
description: Sky Conqueror is an intense, easy to learn skydiving game with an infinite procedurally generated map. A great game to relax for half an hour and chase your latest highscore!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 9800 GT / Radeon HD 4830 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
